build.description: Changes which affect the build system or external dependencies

ci.description: Changes which affect CI configuration files and scripts

feat.description: Changes which introduce a new feature

refactor.description: Changes which neither fix a bug nor add a feature

revert.description: Changes which revert a previous commit

style.description: Changes which don’t affect code logic, such as white-spaces, formatting

test.description: Changes which add missing tests or correct existing tests

footerTypes.name: Closes
footerTypes.description: The commit closes issues or pull requests

footerTypes.name: Refs
footerTypes.description:
The commit references other commits by their hash ID.
For multiple hash IDs use a comma as separator
